As part of an attack action, the magic within the bracer unleashes and not only bypasses a golem's damage resistance, but when used against a Star Golem the bracers also forces the target to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 10 minutes as if @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} had been used against it. The attack action isn't required to succeed in order to use this item's power. Landing a successful subsequent attack against the Star Golem automatically breaks the paralysis
